A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don't believe the anti-hype.  This is a tremendous film that leaves me extremely excited to see where Episode IX goes.  Btw\, the second viewing was even better since I knew where the story was going and I could get the feels\, and it was all waterfalls.  Just beautiful.  And I say this as someone who grew up on the original trilogy\, a fan of forty years: this was exactly the movie I wanted.
